thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 19 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-J B Chemicals And Pharmaceuticals Gets Closure Order For Daman Facility From Pollution Control Committee

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-J B Chemicals And Pharmaceuticals Gets Closure Order For Daman Facility From Pollution Control Committee

organizations.name: daman facility from pollution control committee

text:
April 19 (Reuters) - J B Chemicals and Pharmaceuticals Ltd :
* GOT ORDER FROM POLLUTION CONTROL COMMITTEE DIRECTING CLOSURE OF CO’S FORMULATION MANUFACTURING FACILITY AT DAMAN
* SAYS CO “DOES NOT ACCEPT THE ANALYTICAL RESULTS OBTAINED BY THE SAID AUTHORITY”
* CLOSURE ORDER ON GROUND OF ALLEGED DEVIATION OF STANDARDS OF TREATED WASTE WATER RELEASED FROM ETP OUTLET OF FACILITY Source text: bit.ly/2EZYyWO Further company coverage:
